name: df-cic
body: |- wceq(ccic, cmpt(s0, ccat, co(cfv(ciso, cv(s0)), csupp, emptycls)))
comment: Function returning the set of isomorphic objects for each category ` c ` . Definition 3.15 of [Adamek] p. 29. Analogous to the definition of the group isomorphism relation ` ~=g ` , see ~ df-gic . (Contributed by AV, 4-Apr-2020.)
